summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4389 for the improvement of Brighton Street, from 52nd Avenue South to Seward Park Avenue; by constructing sewers; under Ordinance No. 51930, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
